name: 王金樹
objective: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
schedule:
2/18  Periodic function
2/25  Fourier Sin or cos series properties
3/4   Any period Fourier series
3/10  Fourier Integral Transform and properties
3/17   Symmetry Fourier integral transform
3/24   Parsavel therom
3/31   Application of Fourier transform
4/7   Discrete fourier transform
4/14 期中考
4/21  Complex function calculation
5/5   complex intergral
5/12  Residual
5/19  Comform mapping
5/26  Application of complex integral
6/2   Parabollic Partial Differential Equation
6/9  Elliptic and Hyperbolic Partial Differential Equation
6/16 期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考 40%
期末考 40%
平時考 20%
materials:
Kreyszig Advanced Engineering Math.
Greenberg Foundations of Applied Mathematics
